member.name: T:H5.API.ApiSettings
member.summary: Handles settings file for the API

member.name: F:H5.API.ApiSettings.HTTPSettings.EnableHttp
member.summary: Should the API server respond to http:// requests

member.name: F:H5.API.ApiSettings.HTTPSettings.PortHttp
member.summary: The port the API server listsens for http:// requests on

member.name: F:H5.API.ApiSettings.HTTPSettings.EnableHttps
member.summary: Should the API server respond to https:// requests

member.name: F:H5.API.ApiSettings.HTTPSettings.PortHttps
member.summary: The port the API server listsens for https:// requests on

member.name: F:H5.API.ApiSettings.HTTPSettings.HostNames
member.summary: Hostnames the API server listens for requests on ex. localhost, casa-blanca.com, *

member.name: F:H5.API.ApiSettings.LoggingSettings.MaxLogLevel
member.summary: Lowest level of logs that get printed to console and generic log file

member.name: F:H5.API.ApiSettings.LoggingSettings.LogToConsole
member.summary: Enables/Disables writing generic log to console

member.name: F:H5.API.ApiSettings.LoggingSettings.LogToFile
member.summary: Enables/Disables writing generic log to file

member.name: F:H5.API.ApiSettings.LoggingSettings.LogDirPath
member.summary: Directory logfiles are placed in when is enabled

member.name: F:H5.API.ApiSettings.LoggingSettings.LogW3
member.summary: Enables/Disables writing W3 Extended Log File Format to file

member.name: F:H5.API.ApiSettings.LoggingSettings.LogW3DirPath
member.summary: Directory logfiles are placed in when is enabled

member.name: F:H5.API.ApiSettings.FileServerSettings.ContentRoot
member.summary: Directory path to static content.Defaults to {exe directory}\wwwroot if empty or missing

member.name: F:H5.API.ApiSettings.FileServerSettings.EnableCaching
member.summary: Toggles the file server in-memory cache. Defaults to true if not specified

member.name: F:H5.API.ApiSettings.FileServerSettings.MaxCacheFileSize
member.summary: Maximum size of cached files in bytes. Defaults to 4096 if not specified

member.name: F:H5.API.ApiSettings.FileServerSettings.CacheLifetimeSeconds
member.summary: Seconds a file can go untouched in the cache before it gets cleaned up. Defaults to 600 if not specified
